ü§ñ *Gensyn Multi-VPS Manager*

üÜò *Available Commands:*

/start - Show VPS list
/vpses - Show VPS list
/help - Show this help

üéØ *How to use:*
1. Use /start to see available VPSs
2. Select a VPS to manage
3. Choose actions from the menu

üìñ *Available Actions:*
‚Ä¢ üìä Status - Get Gensyn status
‚Ä¢ üåê Check IP - Get current IP
‚Ä¢ ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Start Gensyn - Start the node
‚Ä¢ ‚èπÔ∏è Stop Gensyn - Stop the node
‚Ä¢ üîí VPN On/Off - Manage VPN
‚Ä¢ üìã Logs - View recent logs
‚Ä¢ üîÑ Update - Update Gensyn

üí° Each VPS is managed independently through this single bot interface.
